title: Two Volumes of solids of revolution

content.question: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the hyperbola x2 − y2 = 9, the x-axis, and the line x = 5. (a) Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving R about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the hyperbola x2 − y2 = 9, the x-axis, and the line x = 5. (a) Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving R about the x-axis.
(b) Set up, but do not integrate, an integral expression in terms of a single variable for the volume of solid generated when R is revolved about the line x = −1.

topic.text: 6.7: The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus and Definite Integrals

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
